reviews.review: This movie is definitely one of the best movies in superhero history. The ending of the movie was one of the best and craziest endings ever. The directors did a great job on being unpredictable. So this deserves a five star rating.

After ten years, this just felt rushed sometimrs and mashed up. Stuff was good but this either should have been a four hour movie or split into two and release the second one 4-6 months from now and release the conclusion next year. This is just a review so I will not go further in detail as to not ruin it for others.
Awesome to see everything come together. I wanted more
Holy Hell...this was so awesome...It was worth the ten year wait...I'm speechless!

Energía, emoción, acción por montones y mucho, mucho corazón se transfieren en la pantalla  por casi 3 horas en el gran fenómeno y la mayor apuesta hasta ahora de Marvel Studios, que estuvo 10 años en planeación y llega en el momento perfecto para dar en la nostalgia de millones de fanáticos. "Avengers: Infinity War" demuestra el talento y pasión de los hermanos Russo que una vez más ganan un éxito en todos los sentidos; brutal, cautivadora por momentos, fascinante en otros y hasta aterradora. La Guerra del Infinito triunfa y deja la vara muy alta (al igual que la expectativa) para el futuro del universo cinematográfico no solo de Marvel, sino de super héroes, demostrando que no es necesario un guión muy inteligente (pues fallos los tiene) o la sobre-abundancia de personajes para ser un gran fenómeno de la cinematografía. Impactante. Y 10 años no han sido suficiente espera, pues se le ve un futuro muy prometedor, con muchas ideas en puerta y la espera de una audiencia cada vez mas metida en la historia de estos personajes. Cabe destacar el gran esfuerzo que le llevó a Marvel entregarnos un digno villano, con motivaciones reales y que por momentos transmitía pánico, sin ser unidimensional y tiene gran futuro en este Universo.
amazing movie with great pacing and story
The movie is great and very very unexpected, definetly recomended.

Great movie. Was worried that it would be too convoluted due to the amount of characters, but past movies setup the whole premise for the culmination of Infinity War. Only thing I would change would be to cut down on the shaky camera during intense action sequences, almost got a bit of vertigo on occasion from all the camera shaking.

Rarely in my life have I seen a movie in the theatre in which following the end credits I want to see it again. That moment. That day. Avengers infinity War is that movie. In fact, it is more than a movie. It's an experience. A moment.  A triumph. A visceral experience only bested by the connection we the audience share with the characters we've met and come to love for the past decade.  To put it simply, stop reading and start spending. Spend the money for a ticket. Spend the time watching it. Spend the emotion while watching it, and then spend the same again and again.  Personally, I'm proud to have been apart of this cinematic gamble that made us all richer! This whole thing is unique and extremely well executed. From the opening sequence that sets the tone of the whole ride, to Thanos and his not so mad plan to save the universe from the life living in it. Avengers infinity war sets a new bar and then resets that same bar for the whole MCU in ways previously that unattainable.
